def upgrade() -> None:
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.add_column('nmap', sa.Column('other_new', sa.Text(), nullable=True))
    op.execute('UPDATE nmap SET other_new = other')
    op.drop_column('nmap', 'other')
    op.alter_column('nmap', 'other_new', new_column_name='other', existing_nullable=True)


    # ### end Alembic commands ###


def downgrade() -> None:
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.add_column('nmap', sa.Column('other_temp', sa.String(length=255), nullable=True))
    op.execute('UPDATE nmap SET other_temp = other')
    op.drop_column('nmap', 'other')
    op.alter_column('nmap', 'other_temp', new_column_name='other', existing_nullable=True)
    # ### end Alembic commands ###
